sect1.title: Using an External &ay; Profile

important.title: &ay; Is Not Supported
important.para: Using &ay; to install &sles4sap; is not officially supported.

sect1.para: For more information on installing with &ay;, see:

listitem.para: &deploy;, Part V Automated Installations, Chapter 25 Automated Installation (&docaddress;).

sect1.para: The installation medium of &sles4sap; contains a preconfigured &ay; XML file and a DUD file. This &ay; XML file is set up to work like the former Wizard-Based Workflow of &sles4sapa; 12 and can be used where compatibility with the old installer is necessary. Both files are contained in the directory sap-apl. However, note that installing using these files is still unsupported.
For more information on partitioning for SAP applications with &ay;, see .
